scripts.build: bun run build:cjs && bun run build:ts
scripts.-- compare-prepare: cd test && bun install && bun run prepare.js
scripts.-- compare-gulp-node: cd test && rm -rf build-gulp && npx gulp@4.0.2 -f gulpfile.cjs build
scripts.-- compare-gulp-bun: cd test && rm -rf build-gulp && bunx --bun gulp@4.0.2 -f gulpfile.cjs build
scripts.-- compare: cd test && hyperfine 'bunx calpis@0.1.0-beta.2 build' 'npx gulp@4.0.2 -f gulpfile.cjs build' --warmup=5
scripts.publish:npm: bun run build && bun run lint && npm publish --access public
